name: Vega Party Game (Board Edition)
description:
NOTE: This is ONLY the board part of the app, i.e. the host, with all content unlocked. To play this game, you need to download the controller app on either Apple AppStore or Google Play Store.

Vega Party Game is here to lighten up your evening, get the video game feeling back and play with up to seven friends. Choose from different mini games: beat your friends in Pong Royale or play together to last as long as possible in Backseat Driver. This multiplayer game is suitable for every hang out-occasion and easy to set up, go ahead and see it for yourself!

* Supports 2-8 players
* 4 fun and easy-to-learn mini games

HOW TO PLAY: To play Vega Party Game you need at least two players and three devices (two controllers and one game board). Decide which device should be the board, connect the other devices as controllers, select a game and start playing!
